item.description:
Join us at Middlesex in Central Square for Cocktails for Justice. Drop by to meet cool, like-minded people, unwind after work, or better yet, check out the benches on wheels.



Don't drink? That's fine. Plenty of folks don't. The emphasis here is less on the cocktails and more on the socializing. And even more so on the justice.

*This event is all ages. No need to be legal drinking age. Well, unless you want to order that sort of beverage.

If you've been looking for like-minded progressives to hang with in Boston, want to cross-promote your events and campaigns while enjoying great cocktails, or are new to the area and looking for groups to get involved in. Be sure not to miss it if you are ready to build cross-issue coalitions - AND have fun!
item.name: Cocktails for Justice
